notes:
üì¢ Update: Stylish Action HUD v1.3.1.1

üî• Hotfix (v1.3.1.1)
* **[DnD 5e] Consumables:** Fixed a critical issue where consumable items could not be used.

‚ú® New Features (v1.3.1)
* **Custom Display Name:** Option to customize the Actor's name on the HUD.
* **Macro Favorites:** Add Macros to Favorites for quick access.
* **Status Positioning:** Adjust Status Icon and Effect positions.

üõ† Improvements
* **Macro Auto-Permission:** Automatically grants ownership when a player uses a macro.
* **Manual Preset Apply:** Presets now require clicking 'Apply' to take effect.
* **[PF2e] Spell Matching:** Improved logic for matching Spell Slots and DCs.

üêõ Bug Fixes
* **Status Dropdown:** Fixed World Status Effects list not showing.
* **Layout Mode:** Fixed placeholders remaining on screen after cancel.

announcement.title: üöÄ v1.3.1.1: Hotfix & QoL Updates
announcement.content: Hotfixed DnD 5e Consumables. Includes Custom Names, Macro Favorites, and Auto-Permission.
